context_bundle.summary: Jenkins: Open-source automation server. Declarative/Scripted pipelines in Jenkinsfile. Key features: 1800+ plugins, distributed builds with agents, Blue Ocean UI, Pipeline as Code. Master-agent architecture for scaling. Groovy DSL for pipeline logic.

onboarding.quick_start: Jenkins Pipeline: 1) Create Jenkinsfile in repo, 2) Define pipeline { agent any; stages { stage('Build') { steps { sh 'make' } } } }, 3) Configure webhook for auto-trigger, 4) Add agents for parallel builds.

known_errors.error: Pipeline script not permitted to use method
known_errors.cause: Script sandbox blocking unapproved Groovy methods
known_errors.solution: Approve script in Manage Jenkins > In-process Script Approval
known_errors.prevention: Use declarative pipeline where possible, minimize custom Groovy
